note: An #introduction = I am a Professor in the School of Education at the University of Tennessee at Chattanooga - I am especially interested in outdoor and environmental education. I am chairperson of Ivy Academy, a public middle- and high-school adjacent to the Cumberland Trail and a partnership with Tennessee State Parks, and I am a board member of the Wilderness Education Association. ETA I love Fallout, Linux, fly fishing, hammock backpacking, easy kayaking, teaching in the outdoors
